preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: You are encouraged to check http://books.sonatype.com/m2eclipse-book weekly for any updates to the content. If you would like to receive updates whenever there is a change to this user's manual, please send a quick note to book@sonatype.com, and we will gladly add your email to the update notification list.
We welcome your feedback, please do not hesitate to contact the Sonatype team with any questions or ideas you may have about the product.

section.title: Revision History
section.para: The following sections list changes made to the book in reverse chronological order starting with ${project.version}.

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.6
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 0.6 on September 15, 2009:

listitem.para: Modified project to generate a PDF for pre-print:
Embedded the fonts in the generated PDF. (MEBOOK-17)
Resized book to Royal Quarto (7.444" x 9.681"). (MEBOOK-16)
Added a Title Page to the PDF. (MEBOOK-21)
Added a blank page to the end of the PDF. (MEBOOK-20)
Automated the production of print and web figures. (MEBOOK-23)
Added the appropriate roles to all imageobjects. (MEBOOK-18)
Added the full text of the Creative Commons license to the front matter. (MEBOOK-33)
Fixed a typo: redundant mention of Subversion in . (MEBOOK-12)
Added clarification about the availability of the Form-based POM Editor to . (MEBOOK-8)
Added new section about the Maven Repository view: . (MEBOOK-19)
Address feedback from Proofread of Edition 0.5 PDF:
Fixed a typo: removed duplicate "about" from page 29. (MEBOOK-28)
Fixed a spelling error on page 51. (MEBOOK-25)
